title: Ozark Mountains Fishing Stories, Vol. 1
description: Here's what you can expect from Ozark Mountains Fishing Stories. “Real fishing stories. You can even read them to your kids around the campfire, in the tent by lantern light, or at home in their beds to get ‘em fired up for the big camping or fishing trip.”“Rolland Love’s writing appeals not only to children, but to their parents, teachers and grandparents as well. Readers feel the magnetism in every page of Love's work, and soon find themselves yearning for the peace and simplicity of an Ozark Fishing Hole. Love's ability to create such a setting and people it with memorable characters has prompted reviewers to liken his style to that of Mark Twain.” Joyce Rabas, Sun NewspaperAMAZON Kindle — Featured Author Review — “Rolland Love’s deep-rooted passion for the Ozarks comes to life in a series of fantastic fishing tales that Huck Finn and Tom Sawyer could have only dreamed of"
author: Rolland Love
